titleStmt.title: A Brief historical account of several of the most remarkable years of war, drought, famine, and pestilence in England, and the time when they happened together with an additional discourse of God's judgments, and the procuring cause of them : as also of the prediction of the late excellent mathematician and modest astrologer Mr. Vincent Wing, as to the present year 1699 / by a gent.
titleStmt.author: Gent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wells in London ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages tightly bound with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
